apis.name: Project templates API
apis.description: Support is also available for group-level file templates.

apis.name: Get all templates of a particular type

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of the template. Accepted values are: dockerfiles, gitignores, gitlab_ci_ymls, licenses, issues, merge_requests

response.name: GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0
GNU Affero General Public License v3.0
GNU Lesser General Public License v2.1

apis.name: Get one template of a particular type

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of the template. One of: dockerfiles, gitignores, gitlab_ci_ymls, licenses, issues, or merge_requests.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The key of the template, as obtained from the collection endpoint

attributes.name: source_template_project_id
attributes.description: The project ID where a given template is being stored. This is useful when multiple templates from different projects have the same name. If multiple templates have the same name, the match from closest ancestor is returned if source_template_project_id is not specified

attributes.name: project
attributes.description: The project name to use when expanding placeholders in the template. Only affects licenses

attributes.name: fullname
attributes.description: The full name of the copyright holder to use when expanding placeholders in the template. Only affects licenses

response.name: MIT License
response.description: A short and simple permissive license with conditions only requiring preservation of copyright and license notices. Licensed works, modifications, and larger works may be distributed under different terms and without source code.
